title: 6 Expert Ways to Style Socks and Shoes This Winter
sub_head: Finding the perfect shoe-sock combo can be daunting. Here, a series of pairings to take women’s cold-weather outfits to the next level.
body: Historically, the rules of sock-wearing have been extreme, ever-changing and often conflicting: Don’t wear patterns! Do wear bright colors! Actually, patterns are imperative—flaunt them for the world to see! Never mind, socks are heinous—cover them at all costs! But as society evolves, so too do our sock tastes, and current guidance is decidedly less dictatorial. Now trending? Comfort, personal style and a smidge of knowingness. Even so, if you spent last winter at home in pilled Smartwools, stepping up your sock game might seem challenging.
